t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if n % 2 != 0:
        X = 0
        for i in nums:
            X ^= i
        nums.remove(X)
        A = list(map(lambda a: a ^ X, nums))
        A.sort()
    else:
        X = min(nums)
        nums.remove(X)
        A = [a ^ X for a in nums]
        A.sort(reverse=True)
    print(*A)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    arr = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    if n % 2 == 0:
        m = min(arr)
        arr.pop(arr.index(m))
        arr = [i ^ m for i in arr]
        print(*arr)
    else:
        d = 0
        for i in arr:
            d ^= i
        arr.pop(arr.index(d))
        arr = [i ^ d for i in arr]
        print(*arr)

import sys
from itertools import islice
from functools import reduce
from operator import xor
for s in islice(sys.stdin, 2, None, 2):
    (*b,) = map(int, s.split())
    x = reduce(xor, b) or min(b)
    if x:
        for i in range(len(b)):
            b[i] ^= x
    b.remove(0)
    print(*b)
